definition: object of ridicule/laughingstock/to laugh over sth/to make light chat
old variant of 笑[xiao4]
laugh/smile/CL:個|个[ge4]
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
surname Tan

sentences.english: The window is bright several only, cup of teas, with your friends at joke world important matter.
sentences.chinese: 窗明几净，一杯茶，三两人在笑谈天下大事。

sentences.english: This riddle, has become the Internal Classic joke.
sentences.chinese: 此谜语，已成为警队内部经典笑谈。

sentences.english: He had many an anecdote of the gilded youth of his time.
sentences.chinese: 他有许多他那时代的阔气少爷们的笑谈。

sentences.english: Thou makest us a byword among the heathen, a shaking of the head among the people.
sentences.chinese: 你使我们在列邦中作了笑谈，使众民向我们摇头。

sentences.english: Chapman joke is the "spy row" opened her "good life.
sentences.chinese: 查普曼笑谈是“间谍风波”开启了她的“美好生活”。

sentences.english: Kate’s failure to get a ring on her finger became a national joke.
sentences.chinese: 凯特手指上连个戒指都没带一度在全英成为笑谈。

sentences.english: I know there are those who dismiss such beliefs as happy talk.
sentences.chinese: 我知道，有人会摒弃这些信念，把它们看做笑谈。

sentences.english: Hopefully it’s something that the whole family can laugh about in years to come.
sentences.chinese: 希望几年后这件事只是整个家庭的一个笑谈而已。

definition: to chat
variant of 閒談|闲谈[xian2 tan2]
sth that people like to chat about/topic of idle conversation
leisure time (over a cup of tea, after a meal etc)
to harangue/loud arrogant talk/to spout
see 茶餘飯後|茶余饭后[cha2 yu2 fan4 hou4]
to talk cheerfully and wittily/to joke together
to dismiss sth with a laugh (idiom)/to laugh it off
anecdote passed on with approbation
to drink and chat merrily (idiom)
to dismiss with a laugh/to make light of
lit. laughs, jeers, anger and invective (idiom)/fig. all kinds of emotions/to mock and scold/(of writing) freely roving/following the author's fancy
to sit face-to-face and drink
joking matter/to go back on one's words
to chat idly
to talk freely/to discuss without inhibition
wine goblets and gambling chips lie intertwined/to drink and gamble together in a large group (idiom)/a big (drinking) party
